name: Tauros
description: The Wild Bull Pokémon. A rowdy Pokémon with a lot of stamina. Once running, it won’t stop until it hits something.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Once per short rest, you can impose disadvantage on an enemy attack roll of your choice.

abilities.name: Anger Point
abilities.description: After suffering a critical hit, this Pokémon doubles the damage dice for a single move it activates on the following turn.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: When activating a move that has a chance to impose a stat change or inflict a status, this creature instead doubles its move modifier for the damage with no chance of the additional effect.
